programme.title: The Great Outdoors

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
programme.desc: After being captured by Turks during the Crusades, Robin of Locksley and a Moor, Azeem, escape back to England where Azeem vows to remain until he repays Robin for saving his life. Meanwhile, Robin's father has been murdered by the Sheriff of Nottingham and when Robin returns home he vows to avenge his father's death. Even though Marian, his childhood friend, cannot help him, he escapes to the Forest of Sherwood where he joins a band of exiled villagers and becomes their leader. With their help he attempts to cleanse the land of the evil that the Sheriff has spread.

programme.title: The Blues Brothers

programme.title: Dr. Seuss' the Lorax
programme.desc: Dr. Seuss' The Lorax is an adaptation of Dr. Seuss' classic tale of a forest creature who shares the enduring power of hope. In the walled city of Thneed-Ville, where everything is artificial and even the air is a commodity, a boy named Ted hopes to win the heart of his dream girl, Audrey. When he learns of her wish to see a real tree, Ted seeks out the Once-ler, a ruined old businessman outside of town in a stark wasteland. Upon hearing of how the hermit gave into his greed for profits and devastated the land over the protests of the Lorax, Ted is inspired to undo the disaster. However, the greedy Mayor of Thneed-Ville, Aloysius O'Hare, has made his fortune exploiting the environmental collapse and is determined to stop the boy from undermining his business.

programme.title: Drillbit Taylor
programme.desc: Owen Wilson stars in this riotous comedy from the producers of 'The 40-Year-Old Virgin' and the writers of 'Superbad'. When three young students, Ryan (Troy Gentile), Wade (Nate Hartley) and Emmit (David Dorfman) attend their first day at high school they come across school bully, Filkins (Alex Frost) who channels Hannibal Lecter. Coming up with the idea of getting some protection from this maniac, they place an ad in 'Soldier of Fortune' magazine looking for a bodyguard. Enter Drillbit Taylor (Wilson), not the best but definitely the cheapest of the mercenaries, hit men and bodyguards who respond. Drillbit is steely, dangerous and skilled in covert black-ops and exotic martial arts; he's also a complete fraud. Taylor enrols them in physical and mental training, steeling them, and possibly himself, for the ultimate clash against the forces of evil.

programme.title: Drillbit Taylor
programme.desc: Owen Wilson stars in this riotous comedy from the producers of 'The 40-Year-Old Virgin' and the writers of 'Superbad'. When three young students, Ryan (Troy Gentile), Wade (Nate Hartley) and Emmit (David Dorfman) attend their first day at high school they come across school bully, Filkins (Alex Frost) who channels Hannibal Lecter. Coming up with the idea of getting some protection from this maniac, they place an ad in 'Soldier of Fortune' magazine looking for a bodyguard. Enter Drillbit Taylor (Wilson), not the best but definitely the cheapest of the mercenaries, hit men and bodyguards who respond. Drillbit is steely, dangerous and skilled in covert black-ops and exotic martial arts; he's also a complete fraud. Taylor enrols them in physical and mental training, steeling them, and possibly himself, for the ultimate clash against the forces of evil.

programme.title: Bad News Bears
programme.desc: Grizzled former professional baseball player Morris Buttermaker (Billy Bob Thornton) is recruited by a strait-laced lawyer (Marcia Gay Harden) to coach the Bears, a woefully inept Little League team. He's got to find a way to drive this gang of 12 misfits to a championship against their hated rivals: the Yankees and their overbearing coach (Greg Kinnear). A hilarious homage to an irreverent 1976 comedy, THE BAD NEWS BEARS.

programme.title: Hot Fuzz
programme.desc: Nicholas Angel is a big-city cop who can't be stopped - but he's making everyone else on the force look bad. When he is reassigned to a small, quiet town, he struggles with this new, seemingly idyllic world and his bumbling partner. But their dull existence is interrupted by several grisly and suspicious accidents, and the crime-fighting duo turn up the heat and hand out high-octane, car-chasing, gun-fighting, big-city justice.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: This film follows devoted lifeguard Mitch Buchannon as he butts heads with a brash new recruit. Together, they uncover a local criminal plot that threatens the future of the bay. For a generation of TV fans the world over, the name Baywatch conjures up images of sun, surf and statuesque lifeguards, running in slow-motion in form-fitting red swimsuits.

programme.title: Night School
programme.desc: When accidentally destroying his workplace gets successful salesman Teddy fired, he can't find another decent job unless he finally gets his GED. But two major things stand in his way: Carrie, a teacher with no time for grown-up class clowns, and Stewart, Teddy's high school nemesis-turned-principal who will do anything to see him fail. Now every school rule is about to be broken when they all go head-to-head in a wild battle of wits, pranks, and lessons you can't learn in books. Night School is in session!
